Get list of versions
GET
https://api.apify.com/v2/acts/:actorId/versions

CLIENTS
Gets the list of versions of a specific Actor. The response is a JSON object with the list of Version objects, where each contains basic information about a single version.

Request​
PATH PARAMETERS
actorId
string
REQUIRED

Actor ID or a tilde-separated owner's username and Actor name.

Responses​
200
Response Headers
APPLICATION/JSON
Schema
Example (auto)
Example
SCHEMA
data
object
REQUIRED
AUTHORIZATION: HTTP
